text: Arau sihamtara ocarata yetiya amara suspasta ayatasamuha tilarata karaa haya, tetiya sihamte kaya, ‘e'om ejana enekuraa byakti yiye tomalokara purba purause yara upasana karaichila tara paraa tomalokaka badha diba bicarae’. Sihamte arau kaya, ‘e'ito micha udbharanara bahirae ana eko nahaya’. Kaphirasakalara ocarata yetiya satya ahe tetiya sihamte kaya, ‘e'ito eta suspasta yaduhe’
